sentences.english: She egged her husband on to save up some money and start his own business.
sentences.chinese: 她攛掇其丈夫攢錢自己開店做生意。

sentences.english: The other boys egged him on fight.
sentences.chinese: 別的孩子攛掇他去打架。

sentences.english: For a long time he has worried me to write an experience of my own.
sentences.chinese: 很久以來他就一直在攛掇我自己寫一篇辦案記錄。

sentences.english: Who egged the boys on to fight each other?
sentences.chinese: 別的孩子攛掇他去打架。
